Summary: Orange glowing fireball, turned to star before disappearing at high rate of speed.
divs: sighting detailsoutside with a friend of mine, looked up at the stars as i usually do. when i noticed an object moving over 65 highway towards the springfield\branson airport before turning away and lowing its luminescence to that of a star. the object proceeded to change direction which is when i lost sight behind some houses. this can be corroborated by someone who was with me. at first i thought it was possibly a flame out on an airplane but the direction change took it away from the airport. there were no signal lights as you would typically see on an airplane\helicopter. when i first saw the object i was excited, this was purely a definition of a ufo, as a flying object which i could not identify. once it went out of view i moved to my front yard to try and see it again however i could not. afterwards there were some kind of short meteor shower, in a very specific area where i first saw the object. i am unsure if this was related, but it was very interesting to watch. i have taken a short video on my cell phone, however it is unworthy of view for i gave up filming it very quickly due to lack of clarity.
